original_text: So he went down and dipped himself seven times in the Jordan, according to the word of the man of God, and his flesh was restored like the flesh of a little child, and he was clean.
korean_text: 나아만이 이에 내려가서 하나님의 사람의 말대로 요단 강에 일곱 번 몸을 잠그니 그의 살이 어린 아이의 살 같이 회복되어 깨끗하게 되었더라

sentences.original_text: and dipped himself seven times in the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 요단 강에서 일곱 번 몸을 담갔습니다

sentences.original_text: according to the word of the man of God
like the flesh of a little child
